PackageOracle.name: DA_CUSTOMIZATION_DETAIL
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_CUSTOMIZATION_DETAIL
/* Generated on 25-FEB-15 03.24.45.900290000 AM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,customization_detail_id IN NUMBER
,customization_id IN NUMBER
,choice_desc IN VARCHAR2
,option_text IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,customization_detail_id IN NUMBER
,customization_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);
PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,customization_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_customization_detail;

body.name: DA_CUSTOMIZATION_DETAIL
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_CUSTOMIZATION_DETAIL
/* Generated on 25-FEB-15 03.24.46.219977000 AM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,customization_detail_id IN NUMBER
,customization_id IN NUMBER
,choice_desc IN VARCHAR2
,option_text IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_customization_detail.add, parms=' || customization_detail_id || '|' || customization_id || '|' || choice_desc || '|' || option_text || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_customization_detail a
(
a.customization_detail_id
,a.customization_id
,a.choice_desc
,a.option_text
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.customization_detail_id
,add.customization_id
,add.choice_desc
,add.option_text
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_customization_detail.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,customization_detail_id IN NUMBER
,customization_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_customization_detail.del, parms=' || customization_detail_id || '|' || customization_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_customization_detail a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.customization_detail_id = del.customization_detail_id
AND a.customization_id = del.customization_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_customization_detail.del');

END del;
PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,customization_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_customization_detail.del, parms=' || customization_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_customization_detail a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.customization_id = del.customization_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_customization_detail.del');

END del;

END da_customization_detail;
